item.description:
Our hike this saturday will be at one of the Essex Land Trust properties.

We will try out their Canfield/Meadow Woods location.

I did a short hike in there to try it and it looks awesome!

I emailed the caretaker and he stated the general practice is dogs can walk off leash as long as they are in voice control.

Website:
http://www.essexlandt...

Information: (Pg 10 of this book)
http://www.essexlandt...

I changed the starting area due to safety. The original one had a small parking lot and was on a busy road. This one is a little harder to get to but is much safer.

Directions: (These are confirmed, changed the parking location for safety)
http://maps.google.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the parking lot with a Blue Ford Edge
item.name: Canfield/Meadow Woods In Essex Land Trust
